```{r}
rugby <- search_tweets("rugby", n = 4000, include_rts = FALSE, geocode = usa)

rugby_map <- lat_lng(rugby)

file.create("rugby_map.RDS")
saveRDS(rugby_map, file = "sport-perceptions/raw-data/rugby_map.RDS")

## plot state boundaries


par(mar = c(0, 0, 0, 0))
maps::map("state", lwd = .25)

## plot lat and lng points onto state map
rugby_p <- plot.new(with(rugby_map, points(lng, lat, pch = 20, cex = .75, col = rgb(0, .3, .7, .75))))

rugby_p + title(main = "attempt")


ggsave(filename = "sport-perceptions/raw-data/rugby_map.png")
```
